html: @bipsluvurself watched LAMHAA. Loved it. What a brilliant movie. Superb theme & story. Finely executed. The role suited u & u nailed it. Loved ur performance. Grt acting. Flawless. I know I'm late by 6 years but I'm glad day I watched it now. Have always been a fan of urs.#Lamhaa

html: Everyone sees who I appear to be, but only a few know the real me. You can only see what I choose to show, There’s so much behind this smile.....you don’t even know. text:
Everyone sees who I appear to be, 
but only a few know the real me.
You can only see what I choose to show, 
There’s so much behind this smile.....you don’t even know.
I Rocky S  pledge not to judge people by their appearance as looks can be deceiving 
#itendswithme
@MissMalinipic.twitter.com/irazfspwhL

html: Using The Secret to create your life is much like making a movie of your life. YOU are the director, the scriptwriter and of course the STAR. Don't be just an uncredited extra in the story of your life.

html: Inner transformation is not a matter of faith or prayer. It involves reason and the use of human intelligence. A calm and healthy mind has a very positive effect on our physical health and well-being.
text: Inner transformation is not a matter of faith or prayer. It involves reason and the use of human intelligence. A calm and healthy mind has a very positive effect on our physical health and well-being.
